channel.title: Cloning an item
channel.description: I would imagine this would be mostly client sided. But my question is how would I go about cloning an item so that they look exactly the same but have different stats and names. I know where to change the stats and names, but I don't know how to make the actual item with that particular model. The item I'm trying to clone is anybody wants to know is a DDS, one of the co-owners on my server wishes to have his own personal DDS with enhanced stats, so I thought it would be a nice little thank you for making our forums that I give him what he wants. So any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Cloning an item
item.dc:creator: @campop2 campop2
item.description:
@campop2 wrote:

I would imagine this would be mostly client sided. But my question is how would I go about cloning an item so that they look exactly the same but have different stats and names. I know where to change the stats and names, but I don’t know how to make the actual item with that particular model. The item I’m trying to clone is anybody wants to know is a DDS, one of the co-owners on my server wishes to have his own personal DDS with enhanced stats, so I thought it would be a nice little thank you for making our forums that I give him what he wants. So any help would be appreciated.
